Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 4 nights march couldnt believe metro station hotel located front top marks location walking distance eiffel tower walked st germain night dinner allocated tiny night hotel toilet constantly flush mode difficult sleep moved upgraded lovely 2 morning unfortunately hear running water hubby getting cranky lack sleep poor guy reception helpful difficult circumstances guess plumbing buildings tricky difficulty sleeping night morning ok offered move continental breakfast lovely surroundings basement breakfast stay beware plumbing

Reviews.Title: “A disappointing stay”
Reviews.Author: LondonPluto
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night chose charming romantic especially hammam decor towels especially tired style makeshift boutique basic tiny mini bar bottle water available hammam dingy hole fronted tiny space tired looking machines gym extremely disappointed ripped deceived professional pictures online tell appealing story

Reviews.Title: “Lovely Stay in a Quaint Parisian Hotel”
Reviews.Author: Shashimi19
Reviews.Content: staying close proximity la tour eiffel des invalides lovely little hotel offered personal touch authentic parisian flair staff personal sweet view decor petit dejeuner lovelyi gladly return business pleasure trip latour

Reviews.Title: “One word - lovely!”
Reviews.Author: moncherie_reu
Reviews.Content: spent 6 nights late feb 2010 thoroughly enjoyed stay deluxe nice french decor spacious location perfect nice quiet neighborhood views invalides opposite metro staff friendly specially ladies day shift cheerful helpful special thanks silvia helping reporting lost camera train authorities press negatives squeaking floors thats traditional french mansion perfect wed definitely

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: BenFr
Reviews.Content: spent nights hotel breakfasts enjoyed hammam sunday morning decorated particularly recommended romantic weekend bathroom clean service excellent employees friendly forthcoming spend pleasant moment hotel definitely recommended escapade paris hotel 7th quarters close eiffel tower seine banks orsay museum

Reviews.Title: “Excellent location”
Reviews.Author: AroeiraMaria
Reviews.Content: stay hotel surprise near eiffel tower invalides front metro station staff restaurants location main attractions hotel charming confortable classic clean breakfast charming ambiance

Reviews.Title: “A bit disapointing”
Reviews.Author: Anders80
Reviews.Content: honest reading reviews bit disappointed hotel hotel hear people talking thru walls metro goes hotel sometimes starts shiver bit walls breakfast bit simple comfy sitting hotel france travel europe lot comparing price disappointed bright spot polite staff followed settled worse ive seen recommend

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel de Latour Maubourg
HotelInfo.Address: 150 rue de Grenelle | 07 Arr., 75007 Paris, France
